title: RansomEye Alert Escalation
description: Frozen schema for alert escalations. All fields are mandatory. No optional fields allowed.

escalation_id.description: Unique identifier for this escalation (UUID v4)

policy_rule_id.description: Policy rule identifier that triggered escalation

explanation_bundle_id.description: Explanation bundle identifier (SEE) - mandatory, no escalation without explanation

escalated_by.description: Entity that escalated alert (human identifier or system)

ledger_entry_id.description: Audit ledger entry ID for this escalation
